messages.text: Hey there. I need to cancel and want to know if I‚Äôll be charged.
I can help with that. Cancellation terms depend on the rate type and how close you are to arrival. If you tell me the property city and the date range, I‚Äôll explain the likely fee window.
It's Sydney. Arrival is in 2 days.
Given you‚Äôre within 48‚Äì72 hours of arrival, many rates become non‚Äërefundable or charge the first night. If you share whether it‚Äôs a flexible or advance purchase rate, I can be more precise.

Saver rates are often more restrictive and may be non‚Äërefundable close to arrival. If you‚Äôd like, a hotel team member can confirm the exact terms tied to your reservation.

messages.text: Hola‚Äîis breakfast included? Also wifi speed?
Breakfast inclusion depends on your rate and package. Complimentary Wi‚ÄëFi is available throughout the hotel; streaming and video calls are supported on the standard network.

Breakfast is typically served 6:30‚Äì10:30 AM on weekdays and 7:00‚Äì11:00 AM on weekends. If your property has seasonal adjustments, I can confirm for this location.

Good question. For this property, any short maintenance closures (e.g., pool/gym) are posted in the pre‚Äëarrival message; currently there are no full-day closures noted.

Buenas. Is this property pet-friendly? I have a small dog.

Many GSH hotels welcome pets, typically with weight limits and a per-stay or per-night fee. Service animals are always welcome. Tell me the brand (UrbanStay / GrandStay Business / Resorts) and we‚Äôll confirm the standard policy.
It's GrandStay Business. 8kg. any deposit?

For small pets like 8kg, it‚Äôs usually permitted with a cleaning fee; refundable deposits are less common but may apply at select properties. We can note the pet on the reservation so the hotel prepares a pet kit if available.

messages.text: Hey there! First time in Casablanca. Any areas to avoid at night? also best way from downtown?

Happy to help. For most major areas, stick to well-lit main streets at night and use licensed rides or the metro/taxi stands. From downtown, public transit is usually fastest during rush hour; rideshare is easiest late night.
Any must-see spots for a 1-day trip?
Top picks: a central landmark walk, one major museum or market, and a viewpoint/sunset spot. If you tell me what you like (food, history, shopping), I‚Äôll tailor a quick 1-day plan.
Food + culutre. not big on shopping.

Great‚Äîdo a morning cultural site or museum, lunch in a local food district, then an early evening neighborhood stroll with a casual dinner. If you share your day of week, I‚Äôll note any closures (some museums close Mondays).
Great, noted.

messages.text: Bonsoir! First time in Cape Town. Any areas to avoid at night? also best way from downtown?

Happy to help. For most major areas, stick to well-lit main streets at night and use licensed rides or the metro/taxi stands. From downtown, public transit is usually fastest during rush hour; rideshare is easiest late night.
Any must-see spots for a 1-day trip?
Top picks: a central landmark walk, one major museum or market, and a viewpoint/sunset spot. If you tell me what you like (food, history, shopping), I‚Äôll tailor a quick 1-day plan.
Food + culture. not big on shopping.

Great‚Äîdo a morning cultural site or museum, lunch in a local food district, then an early evening neighborhood stroll with a casual dinner. If you share your day of week, I‚Äôll note any closures (some museums close Mondays).
Merci !
C‚Äôest not√©. Bon s√©jour !
Hello‚ÄîI need an invoice for my stay. Can you email it?

I can help you get a copy. For privacy, we don‚Äôt collect emails in chat. You can request the invoice at the front desk, or we can have the hotel resend it through the secure channel tied to your reservation.
I already checked out. Can you send it here?

For security, we can‚Äôt share full invoices directly in chat. The fastest option is to request it via the reservation channel or call the property‚Äîif you prefer, I can connect you to the billing team.
Ok connect me.
Sure‚Äîif you message ‚ÄúBilling‚Äù with your RES_ID placeholder, the property team can pick it up and resend securely.
Thanks!
You're all set. Safe travels!
Hey there! I'm not a member‚Äîdo I get late checkout at Los Angeles?

Late check-out benefits depend on your GSH loyalty tier and availability on departure day. Gold and Platinum typically receive priority for late check-out requests, while Silver receives standard preference. We‚Äôll confirm at the desk or via chat on the morning of departure.
How do points post? I stayed last weekend but don't see them.

Points usually post wihtin 3‚Äì7 days after checkout, once the stay is marked as completed. If it‚Äôs been longer than 7 days, we can open a missing-stay review (no personal details needed here‚Äîjust your RES_ID placeholder).
It's been 9 days. RES_ID_037
Since it‚Äôs been 9 days, the next step is a missing-stay review. If you want, I can connect you with the loyalty team to process it.
No worries, I'll wait a bit more.
Appreciate it.
Anything else I can help with today?

Hello! What time is check-in at Sydney? Also, can I do early check-in?
Standard check-in is 3:00 PM and check-out is 12:00 PM. Early check-in is based on availability; we can note your preference and confirm closer to arrival.
I arrive around 11am. any fee?
If an early check-in fee applies, it depends on occupancy and how early the room is ready. If you share your arrival day, I can add a request for 11:00 AM to the property.
Arriving next ewek. pls add request. RES_ID_035
Done‚ÄîI've added an early check-in request for around 11:00 AM to your reservation. We‚Äôll do our best and confirm at the desk on arrival.
Appreciate it.

messages.text: Hey there‚Äîis breakfast included? Also wifi speed?
Breakfast inclusion depends on yoru rate and package. Complimentary Wi‚ÄëFi is available throughout the hotel; streaming and video calls are supported on the standard network.
What time is breakfast served?
Breakfast is typically served 6:30‚Äì10:30 AM on weekdays and 7:00‚Äì11:00 AM on weekends. If your property has seasonal adjustments, I can confirm for this location.
Appreciate it.

Hello. I need to cancel and want to know if I‚Äôll be charged.
I can help with that. Cancellation terms depend on the rate type and how close you are to arrival. If you tell me the property city and the date range, I‚Äôll explain the likely fee window.
It's Cape Town. Arrival is in 2 days.
Given you‚Äôre within 48‚Äì72 hours of arrival, many rates become non‚Äërefundable or charge the first night. If you share whether it‚Äôs a flexible or advance purchase rate, I can be more precise.
Not sure. it's labeled 'Saver'.
Saver rates are often more restrictive and may be non‚Äërefundable close to arrival. If you‚Äôd like, a hotel team member can confirm the exact terms tied to your reservation.

Hola. Is anything under renovation right now? I saw a note online and I'm worried.
Thanks for checking. Some propreties have phased updates that can affect lobby areas or certain floors, but we aim to minimize noise during quiet hours.
Will the gym be open in the morning?
If there‚Äôs a temporary closure, we typically offer an alternative (e.g., partner gym access or adjusted hours). Let me confirm the current status for this property.
As a general guide, fitness centers remain open unless a short maintenance window is posted. If you share your stay dates, I can check if any seasonal changes apply.
Ok thanks, dates are in May.
Noted‚ÄîMay typically runs on standard hours. If anything changes, we‚Äôll post it in the pre-arrival message in-app.
